00053 //! class ProblemTrio<br>This class defines the API a problem has to implement in order to be coupled.<br>For precise specifications and possible use of this API, See NT<br>SSTH/LMDL_2006_001<br>Implements IterativeUnsteadyProblem and FieldIO
00054 //
00055 class ProblemTrio : public Problem
00056 {
00057 
00058 public :
00059 // interface specifique
00060   bool initialize_pb(Probleme_U& pb);
00061 
00062 // interface Problem
00063   ProblemTrio();
00064   virtual void setDataFile(const std::string& datafile);
00065   virtual void setMPIComm(void*);
00066 
00067 
00068   virtual ~ProblemTrio()  ;
00069   virtual bool initialize();
00070 
00071   virtual void terminate();
00072 
00073 // interface UnsteadyProblem
00074 
00075   virtual double presentTime() const;
00076   virtual double computeTimeStep(bool& stop) const;
00077   virtual bool initTimeStep(double dt);
00078   virtual bool solveTimeStep();
00079   virtual void validateTimeStep();
00080   virtual void setStationaryMode(bool stationary); //!< new in V2
00081   virtual bool getStationaryMode() const; //!< new in V2
00082   virtual bool isStationary() const;
00083   virtual void abortTimeStep();
00084 
00085 // interface IterativeUnsteadyProblem
00086 
00087   virtual bool iterateTimeStep(bool& converged);
00088 
00089 // Field I/O methods. Those methods are **optional**, and not all of them need to be implemented!
00090 // 
00091   virtual std::vector<std::string> getInputFieldsNames() const;
00092   virtual std::vector<std::string> getOutputFieldsNames() const;
00093   virtual ValueType getFieldType(const std::string& name) const;
00094 
00095 // TrioField fields I/O
00096   virtual void getInputFieldTemplate(const std::string& name, TrioField& afield) const;
00097   virtual void setInputField(const std::string& name, const TrioField& afield);
00098   virtual void getOutputField(const std::string& name, TrioField& afield) const;
00099   virtual void updateOutputField(const std::string& name, TrioField& afield) const;
00100 
00101 // 
00102 // MED fields I/O: double, int and string.
00103 // 
00104   virtual void getInputMEDDoubleFieldTemplate(const std::string& name, MEDDoubleField& afield) const;
00105   virtual void setInputMEDDoubleField(const std::string& name, const MEDDoubleField& afield);
00106   virtual void getOutputMEDDoubleField(const std::string& name, MEDDoubleField& afield) const;
00107   virtual void updateOutputMEDDoubleField(const std::string& name, MEDDoubleField& afield) const;
00108 
00109 
00110 // Specific to MEDCoupling:
00111   virtual int getMEDCouplingMajorVersion() const;
00112   virtual bool isMEDCoupling64Bits() const;
00113 
00114   virtual double getOutputDoubleValue(const std::string& name) const;
00115   virtual void setInputDoubleValue(const std::string& name, const double& val);
00116 protected :
00117 
00118   Init_Params* my_params;
00119   Probleme_U* pb;
00120   mon_main* p;
00121 
00122 };
